Class KeyboardHub

java.lang.Object
fr.connexe.ui.game.input.KeyboardHub
public class KeyboardHub extends Object

Receives keyboard input from a JavaFX scene, providing the currently pressed keys at any time.

Uses JavaFX's API (Scene.getOnKeyPressed() and Scene.getOnKeyReleased()) to listen for key events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    KeyboardHub(Scene scene)
    Creates a new KeyboardHub and sets up the key event listeners on the given scene.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    EnumSet<KeyCode>
    getPressedKeys()
    Returns all currently pressed keys.

  • Constructor Details

    • KeyboardHub

      public KeyboardHub(Scene scene)

      Creates a new KeyboardHub and sets up the key event listeners on the given scene.

      Only one KeyboardHub can listen to key events on a scene at a time.

      Parameters:
      scene - the JavaFX scene to listen for key events

  • Method Details

    • getPressedKeys

      public EnumSet<KeyCode> getPressedKeys()
      Returns all currently pressed keys.
      Returns:
      a copy of the set of currently pressed keys
